about_the_game:
Step into Midnight Watch, where fear and strategy intertwine in a unique blend of atmospheric horror. As the lone night watchman in a once-abandoned facility, it's up to you to maintain safety while battling paranormal forces that threaten to unleash chaos.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Surveillance: Monitor dimly lit hallways and rooms through a complex CCTV system. Stay vigilant for any signs of paranormal activity.
  • Tense Resource Management: Carefully manage your limited supply of electrical power to keep vital systems operational. Every decision impacts your survival.
  • Supernatural Threats: Face off against a terrifying array of ghosts, each with unique abilities that test your skill and reflexes. Some can possess equipment, others disrupt your systems — adapt quickly to their unpredictable behaviors.
  • Complex Puzzles: Restore power in generator rooms, navigate dark hallways with your flashlight, and decode encrypted files to uncover the disturbing past of the facility.
  • Multiple Endings: Your decisions determine the outcome. Will you uncover the truth behind the haunting and escape with your life, or will you be consumed by its horrors?

Midnight Watch is a gripping experience that challenges you to stay one step ahead of the supernatural forces at play. Can you survive the night and uncover the facility's dark secrets, or will you be consumed by its horrors?

content_descriptors.notes: This horror game contains blood, violence, and other horror related content.

short_description: Midnight watch: When night falls, creepy shadows creep through the halls and unseen spirits roam. Take up your watch and expose the disturbing truths hidden in the darkness. Will you survive the night, or will the midnight terrors consume you?
